creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
provenance: J.A. Boerner, (L. 269); N.D. Goldsmid, (L. 1962); Lawson Thompson, (L. 1770). William M. Ladd, Portland, Ore., sold to Jones; Herschel V. Jones, Minneapolis, until 1916; guiven to MIA.
title: The Cottage on the Hill
